text: "Everywhere, Everything" is a song recorded by American singer-songwriter Noah Kahan, for his third studio album Stick Season. It was released on October 14, 2022. The track was written and produced by Kahan, along with Gabe Simon. A duet version of the song, with singer-songwriter Gracie Abrams, was released on December 1, 2023, as the fourth single from the album's 2024 expanded edition, subtitled Forever. ==References== Category:2023 songs Category:Gracie Abrams songs
title: Everywhere, Everything
